ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... THAT explains it!!! I wondered why I never saw a message about my evocation skill until it was at 9 - *DUH* (lightbulb) The first message you see obviously
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:23 PM 5/12/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
>Also, if you buy a skill late... say when you are 15... for some reason you
>will not see that you have gone up intill you get a rank of 16. (don't know
>why it happens... but it does) so you are learning... it is just invisible
>to you.

THAT explains it!!! I wondered why I never saw a message about my evocation
skill until it was at 9 - *DUH* (lightbulb) The first message you see
obviously appears at (Current Char. level+1) skill level. Freaky.

Talies (who also plays a bitter grumpy old Gnome Enchanter)
